Large language models like GPT-3 are trained on huge corpora.
Retrieval-Augmented Generation uses external documents to enhance answers.
BM25 is a sparse information retrieval algorithm using term frequency.
Faiss enables fast similarity search over dense embeddings.
Hybrid search combines semantic and keyword-based search methods.
Vector databases are used to store and retrieve dense embeddings.
LangChain and LlamaIndex are common frameworks for building RAG apps.
Dense retrieval leverages sentence transformers to find similar documents.
